item.title: Depets Self Cleaning Slicker Brush, Dog Cat Bunny Pet Grooming Shedding Brush – Easy to Remove Loose Undercoat, Pet Massaging Tool Suitable for Pets with Long or Short Hair
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand Depets, founded in 2016, is a professional pet supply brand. We specialize in pet daily necessities, toys, cleaning and grooming supplies. Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $15.99 - $6.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:39:08 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Depets, founded in 2016, is a professional pet supply brand. We specialize in pet daily necessities, toys, cleaning and grooming supplies.

Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to make a better life for pets with every pet owner.

cat feeder, cat cone, cat door

pet supplies

pet toys, pet carrier sling

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.37 x 5.43 x 2.17 inches; 5.61 Ounces
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Depets
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08FJ655HL

Great Brush, Healthy Pets. The cat grooming brush with round beads can do massage for your pets and prevent scratching your pet’s skin. The design of stainless steel needles with a 60-degree bend and some elasticity is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.
One-click Cleaning Button. You just have to Simply push the button and the hair will be super simple removed from the cat hair brush. Furthermore, our dog grooming brush is washable, which can be kept in clean.
Comfortable and Nonslip Handle. Our cat shedding brush is designed with a comfort-grip and nonslip handle, and this self cleaning cat brush also has a massage function for your hand and you won’t get tired easily when you brush your pet.
Enjoyable Brushing Experience. Grooming pets can strengthen communication and further the bond between you and your pets. Our pet brush is suitable for all breeds and coat types. With Depets dog and cat shedding brush, your beloved pet will enjoy the time of grooming.

From a variety kind of pet brushes, I chose this one for my own lovely pets (Yoyo & Yiyi). Every time I brush Yiyi, she rubs my hand and makes enjoyable meow. As for my doggy Yoyo, she always has a happy face when I do this to her. We all love this cat and dog shedding brush, so I want to share it with every pet owner and I hope you and your beloved pet will enjoy it like us.

Washable:Washable feature keep the brush hygienic

Size: 7.7″ ×4.1″(L×W)

Color: blue + white

Material: Stainless steel + ABS Plastic + Rubber

Read more

The round end of the needles can do massage for your pets without scratching his/her skins, which is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.

The comfort-grip handle is designed to prevent hand and wrist strain.

Read more

Valuable Brush. This cat slicker brush can easily remove loose hair, shedding Mats, tangled hair, Dander and Dirt of your lovely pets, our cat brushes for indoor cats not only keep your pets clean, but also provide you with a hygienic home environment.

Healthy Pet. The dog shedding brush with round beads can increase blood circulation and keep your pet’s coat soft and shiny.

Read more

Usage

Step1: Brush your pet with gentle move.

Step2: Click the button.

Step3: Remove the hair from the pet brush.

Read more

How to reduce the pain during brushing?

  1. Hold the hair root with one hand, comb along the direction of hair growth with the other hand;
  2. When the hair knots are serious behind the ears and on the neck, the movements should be gentle;
  3. Comb the long hair layer by layer, turning the outer layer over and combing the inner layer.

What if my pet doesn’t like this dog and cat hair brush?

You can guide with snack, lengthen the grooming time every day, our self cleaning slicker brush is gentle and not stimulating, your cute pet will gradually like it.

Note:

  1. Store out of reach of children.
  2. Stress may cause skin irritation, you should brush your pet gently.
  3. Be careful with pets that suffer from skin irritation or weak skin sensitivity.

Read more

4.5
Price: $15.99 - $6.79
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:39:08 UTC – Details)

Product Description

MUYI 20 PIECES DECORATION STRIP, personalized decor for your car vent outlet. Makes your car interior atmosphere stylish and brightly; gives you an enjoyable driving experience!

Decoration Trim Product Size Measuring 7.68″ in length, 0.16″ in widith, 0.3″ in heigth.

Perfect selection for Mother’s Day, Birthday, Christmas, Valentine day, Wedding, and New Year.

MUYI 20 PIECES AIR OUTLET TRIM Features

Soft PVC, electroplated processU-shaped design, tighten automaticallyFree cuttingWaterproof and Sun CareMultiple color options20pcs per package Attention PLEASE!

PLEASE MAKE SURE IF ITS COMPATIBLE BEFORE PURCHASED!

Effect display

The front grille is mundane and boring before install the MUYI shiny decoration trim.

Effect display

The air outlet is upscale and full of atmosphere after installation.

Effect display

The front grille is mundane and boring before install the MUYI shiny decoration trim.

Effect display

The front grille is full of personality and dazzling after installation.

ONLY SUITABLE FOR STRIP AIR OUTLETS!! PLEASE DOUBLE CONFIRM BEFORE PURCHASED!!!

Horizontal Vent

Suitable for horizontal vents.

Vertical Vent

Suitable for 90% of vertical vents with no curves.

Horizontal Round Vent

Only fit for vents with flat and straight fan blades.

NONE OF THE FOLLOWING AIR OUTLETS ARE SUITABLE!! PLEASE DOUBLE CONFIRM BEFORE PURCHASED!!!

Irregular Round Vent

Not suitable for irregular round vent with no fan blades.

Round Vent

Not suitable for round vent with curvy fan blades.

Irregular Round Vent

Not suitable for round vents with fixed inner circles.

STEP FOR INSTALLATION

20PCS 20PCS 20PCS

Length
7.68 inches 7.68 inches 7.68 inches

Width
0.16 inches 0.16 inches 0.16 inches

Height
0.3 inches 0.3 inches 0.3 inches

Personalized Decor – Those 20-pieces shiny decoration strip makes your car interior atmosphere stylish and brightly; gives you an enjoyable driving experience.
Durable Quality – Made of high quality PVC material in Plating Effect. MUYI car vent strim accessory features with waterproof, corrosion resistant, bendable, can be used for a long time without worry of breakdown, fade and scratch.
Universal Design – U-shaped design, seamlessly fits. Measuring 7.68″ in length, 0.16″ in widith, 0.3″ in heigth. Suitable for straight air vent outlet grille type, as you can see from photo, not suitable for arc, curve or round type. PLEASE MAKE SURE IF ITS COMPATIBLE BEFORE PURCHASED!
Handy Operation – Convenient and easy to use. Step 1, you need to Wipe clean the outlet before installation. Step 2, measure and compare the size, use scissor to cut the length that match the air outlet. Step 3, open the strip and snap on the air vent outlet.
Package Include – Pack of 20 pieces car vent outlet trims. Make your car interior more sparkling and stylish. It also a perfect gifts for Mother’s Day, Birthday, Christmas, Valentine day, Wedding, and New Year.

item.title: Hurray 3 Pack Puppy Chew Toys for Teething Puppies, Puppy Teething Toys, 360° Clean Pet Teeth & Soothe Pain of Teeth Growing, Puppy Toys Small Dogs & Medium Dog Suitable – Up to 18 lbs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description For dogs and other pets, toys are not a luxury, but a necessity. Toys aren’t a luxury when it comes to your dog. They’re an absolute necessity. They not only prevent boredom and the negative behaviors that can arise when dogs are bored, they also stimulate their brains ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $12.99 - $9.94
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:32:03 UTC – Details)

Product Description

For dogs and other pets, toys are not a luxury, but a necessity.

Toys aren’t a luxury when it comes to your dog. They’re an absolute necessity. They not only prevent boredom and the negative behaviors that can arise when dogs are bored, they also stimulate their brains and trigger dogs’ natural play drive.

1. Active toys: The interactive dog biting toys can be applied for training your dog’s biting skills, helping them correct the destructive bitting habits, guide a correct chewing habits. Protecting shoes, socks, sheets, sofas not being destroyed! It is also a puzzle toy for dog grow.

2. Comfort toys: When a dog is teething, its gums will be itchy and ache, which is very painful. The pea shaped chew toys through let the dog bites something to relieve the pain of teething.

3. Distraction toys: Toys are important to your dog’s well-being. Toys help fight boredom when you have to leave your dog at home, and provide comfort when they’re feeling nervous. Toys can even help prevent your dog from developing certain problem behavior

Soft without hurting teeth

The Hurray rubber toy is very soft and can even be bent 90 degrees without breaking, fully protecting the dog’s teeth.

Clean teeth in all directions

When a dog is teething, its gums will be itchy and ache, which is very painful. The pea shaped chew toys through let the dog bites something to relieve the pain of teething.

It adopts 360-degree full-enclosed molar protruding points, a total of 578 protruding points.

Nature Rubber & Non-toxic

The Hurray pea shape dog chew toys are made of natural rubber, It’s very durable non-toxic. And the size are suitable for small or medium dog.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.72 x 1.97 x 1.38 inches; 6.7 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 17, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ INECO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08Z851B92

Dog toys for small dogs, adopts 360-degree full-enclosed molar protruding points, a total of 578 protruding points, the height of the protruding points is high, and the pet molars have a good effect. Clean the tartar for dogs in all directions, prevent dental diseases, and maintain oral health. Let the dog have a shining good tooth.
Puppy chew toys Made of rubber , fit for chewing and will not hurt the puppie’s teeth. The puppy has no pain in the gums when used, which makes them love it.
The teething chew toys for puppies can be easily cleaned with water.
You can use the puppy toys to interactive with you dog, increase interest, enhance the dog’s interest, develop the dog’s intelligence, give the dog more care and make them smarter.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description PREFESSIONAL QUIET MOTOR √ Low Noise Design √ Lower Than 50db √ Make It Easy For Your Pet SHARP KNIFE Professional Ceramic Knife Head √ Durable √ Sharp √ No Fever SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS Four Size Combs √ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $20.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 01:58:01 UTC – Details)

Product Description

PREFESSIONAL QUIET MOTOR

√ Low Noise Design

√ Lower Than 50db

√ Make It Easy For Your Pet

SHARP KNIFE

Professional Ceramic Knife Head

√ Durable

√ Sharp

√ No Fever

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

Four Size Combs

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

Four Size Combs

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

Four Size Combs

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SUITABLE FOR BEGINNERS

Four Size Combs

√ 3 – 6- 9 – 12 mm

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 1

It’s not easy to trim the whole face. You can try to start with the dog’s eyebrows. Scissors should not be pointed at the eyes, so as not to hurt the eyes when the dog is in disorder.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 2

Lip edges and long mandibular hair are useless and can affect the appearance. They should be cut off. When pruning, press its lips first, so as not to cause damage by sudden turbulence.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 3

Pay attention to trimming the dog’s ear hairs. Hollowing out the inner hair of the ear can make the dog feel as comfortable as possible in the hot summer.

SOME EASY USING TIPS – 4

Trim the ear properly. If you want it to look round, don’t cut it too short around the ear roots, depending on your preferences.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.31 x 5.51 x 2.8 inches; 15.84 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 30, 2007
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Highdas
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07SSRDCHT

★RECHARGEABLE BATTERIES – Rechargeable clippers can make it flexible for you. It is no problem to use when charging, don’t worry, and it is safe and will not stop working.
★SAFE AND SHARP BLADE – It is suitable for the most skin-friendly grooming experience, and thanks to the precision-cut titanium blades, there’s no uncomfortable pulling at your pet’s hair.
★EASY TO USE AND ADJUSTABLE – We have 4 guard combs(3mm/6mm/9mm/12mm). The adjustable clipping comb is applicable for clipping hair of different lengths; and the detachable guide combs make for quick, easy comb changes and increased versatility.
★PAY ATTENTION – Using the scissors to cut the hair shorter first if your pet has a extremely long and thick hair cause it will make the clippers get stuck and stop working.

Product Description

Sticky note boards

Material: acrylic

Color: Transparent

Size: 11×3.1×0.05 inch

Weight: 145g

Package includes: 4 Sticky note boards

High Quality Materials

Computer monitor message board made of clear acrylic material, stylish, durable, easy to paste, record important things and to-dos, make your life more organized and convenient.

Concise Beautiful

The computer message board is clear and transparent, simple and beautiful, keeping the desktop clean, and brings more fun to the office.

Easy To Remove

Multifunction computer monitor memo board, easy to remove, will not damage your monitor or leave unsightly marks when removed.

1.Tear off the surface protective film before use.

2.Remove the self-adhesive tape

3. Paste the memo board to the computer.

Warm Tips:

Please stick the computer memo board on the frame of your computer instead of the computer screen to avoid damaging your screen.

HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: Monitor memo board is made of acrylic material, which is simple and stylish, light weight, easy to use, durable, not easy to fall off or break. Note: Please stick the memo message board on the computer frame instead of the computer screen to avoid damage to the screen.
PRODUCT SIZE: Computer monitors message board size is 11×3.1×0.05inch, suitable for most computer monitor. Note holder for monitor simply peels off the sticker and hang it over the edge of the monitor screen of either side to use.
HOW TO USE: You need to tears off the computer side panel memo surface protective film, wipe the dust on the edge of the computer monitor, and stick the board to the right or left side of tape, and you’re done.
EASY STORAGE: Monitor memo is easy to use, you can stick a memo on the message board to record important things and to-dos to prevent forgetting. Memo board for office easy to store, make your life more organized and more convenient to use.
WIDE APPLICATION: Computer monitor side panel is suitable for home, office, bringing convenience to your life. Multifunction computer monitor memo board to meet your daily needs in the office and at home, never forget what you want to do, and bring you a good experience.

Product Description

Multifunctional monitor side panel, you can paste memos on the message board, record important things and to-do items, prevent forgetting, and make your life more organized and convenient.

Computer monitor memo board

Material: Acrylic

Color: transparent

Shape: Rectangle

Size: 11.8×3.1×0.8inch

The package includes: 1 set of computer monitor memo board (left and right)

High Quality Materials

Computer side panel memo made of clear acrylic material, simple and stylish, durable and easy to install, just peel off the sticker and hang it on the edge of the monitor screen on both sides.

Top Clip

Transparent monitor memo board,on the top are adjustable clips that hold non-stick paper, photos, and your business cards, adding an extra feature to the whiteboard.

Bottom Bracket

Monitor memo board the bottom bracket can be used to hold mobile phones or other small objects, with a charging hole, you can connect the power supply through the hole, which is convenient for charging.

DURABLE MATERIAL: Display sides panel is made of transparent acrylic material, durable, simple and stylish. Monitor memo board is easy to fit, just tear off the sticker and hang it on the edges of both sides of the monitor screen.
EASY TO USE:Display memo board size 11.8×3.1×0.8inch. You can paste memos on the message board to record important things and to-dos to prevent forgetting.Desktop memo boards the bottom to fix the phone Or other small objects, convenient storage, make your life more organized and more convenient.
THE PACKAGE INCLUDES: Acrylic message board is a pair of suits, one on each side (left And Right) 1 Set. Meet your daily needs in office and home, and bring you a good experience. You can paste the note board on both sides with the computer screen, so that you will not forget what you want to do.
WIDELY USED:Transparent monitors memo board the bottom bracket can be used to fix the mobile phone. Desktop memo was used to organize important information, meeting memos, business cards, notes, planning notes, etc.
GURANTEE FOR YOU:If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase or the product is damaged in transit, broken, please contact us promptly.We will solve your problems promptly.
